expo.name: LYNKD

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: LYNKD accesses your photo library only when you choose to select photos or videos to share in posts, update your profile picture or banner, or add product images to your store. Only the items you select are uploaded.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: LYNKD saves photos and videos you create within the app (such as edited images or captured content) back to your photo library so you can access them later.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: LYNKD needs access to your camera so you can take photos and record videos to share in your posts, update your profile picture, or capture content for your store listings.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: LYNKD needs access to your microphone so you can record audio when creating video posts, live streams, or adding voice content to your stories and messages.

expo.description: LYNKD is a social commerce platform connecting users through posts, products, and communities. We prioritize user safety with comprehensive content moderation, including automated filtering, user reporting tools, blocking capabilities, and a commitment to review all reports within 24 hours.
